articles.title: Kim Jong Un Issues Order on Launching Earth Observation Satellite Kwangmyongsong-4
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Issues Order on Launching Earth Observation Satellite Kwangmyongsong-4
Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the Workers' Party of Korea, the state and the army, issued an autograph order on launching earth observation satellite Kwangmyongsong-4 on Feb. 6, Juche 105 (2016).
					 The National Aerospace Development Administration of the DPRK will publish a report on the successful launch of earth observation satellite Kwangmyongsong-4 under the direct guidance of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: DPRK National Aerospace Development Administration Releases Report on Satellite Launch
articles.content:
DPRK National Aerospace Development Administration Releases Report on Satellite Launch
Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- The DPRK National Aerospace Development Administration on Sunday issued a report on the successful launch of earth observation satellite Kwangmyongsong-4.
					 The report said:
					
					 Scientists and technicians of the DPRK National Aerospace Development Administration succeeded in putting the newly developed earth observation satellite Kwangmyongsong-4 into its orbit according to the 2016 plan of the 5-year program for national aerospace development.
					
					 Carrier rocket Kwangmyongsong blasted off from the Sohae Space Center in Cholsan County, North Phyongan Province at 09:00 on February 7, Juche 105(2016). The satellite entered its preset orbit at 09:09:46, 9 minutes and 46 seconds after the lift-off.
					
					 The satellite is going round the polar orbit at 494.6 km perigee altitude and 500 km apogee altitude at the angle of inclination of 97.4 degrees. Its cycle is 94 minutes and 24 seconds.
					
					 Installed in Kwangmyongsong-4 are measuring apparatuses and telecommunications apparatuses needed for observing the earth.
					
					 The complete success made in the Kwangmyongsong-4 lift-off is the proud fruition of the great Workers' Party of Korea's policy on attaching importance to science and technology and an epochal event in developing the country's science, technology, economy and defense capability by legitimately exercising the right to use space for independent and peaceful purposes.
					
					 The fascinating vapor of Juche satellite trailing in the clear and blue sky in spring of February on the threshold of the Day of the Shining Star, the greatest national holiday of Kim Il Sung's Korea, is a gift of most intense loyalty presented by our space scientists and technicians to the great Comrade Kim Jong Un, our dignified party, state and people.
					
					 The National Aerospace Development Administration of the DPRK will in the future, too, launch more satellites of Juche into the space, true to the great Workers' Party of Korea's policy of attaching importance to science and technology.

articles.title: Meteorological Experts Rejoice over Successful Satellite Launch
articles.content:
Meteorological Experts Rejoice over Successful Satellite Launch
Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- Scientists and researchers of the State Hydro-meteorological Administration are delighted at the news about the successful launch of earth observation satellite Kwangmyongsong-4.
					When interviewed by KCNA, Ryu Pong Chol, deputy director of the administration, said:
					
					We are very excited at the successful launch of earth observation satellite into the space.
					
					The meteorological data from the satellite would be greatly helpful to our administration as well as the building of economic giant.
					
					Choe Kwang Guk, the head of the National Meteorological Observatory, said:
					
					I extend warm congratulations to our space scientists and technicians.
					
					The successful satellite launch following the successful H-bomb test encourages us to greet the 7th Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea with unprecedented achievements.
					
					Pang Sun Nyo, section chief of the administration, said that she would devote her all to make fresh achievements in meteorological observation in the spirit displayed by the space scientists and technicians who succeeded in launching the satellite into space.

articles.title: Pyongyangites Hail Successful Satellite Launch
articles.content:
Pyongyangites Hail Successful Satellite Launch
Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- The successful launch of earth observation satellite Kwangmyongsong-4 drives Pyongyangites into great ecstasy.
					 In this regard, Kim Pyong Sik, vice-minister of Physical Culture and Sports, told KCNA:
					
					 Another satellite was launched into the space on the threshold of the Day of the Shining Star, the greatest national holiday.
					
					 I am proud of being a member of Kim Il Sung's and Kim Jong Il's nation, a nuclear weapons state.
					
					 The successful launch is a manifestation of great vitality of the policy of the Workers' Party of Korea on attaching great importance to science and technology.
					
					 Han Un Chol, a student of Kim Il Sung University, said:
					
					 We raised the cheers of hurrah for the successful launch of satellite.
					
					 We are fully determined to prepare ourselves to be patriots like those space scientists and technicians.

articles.title: DPRK Hero and Agricultural Workers Meet
articles.content:
DPRK Hero and Agricultural Workers Meet
Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- There took place a meeting of a DPRK hero, agricultural workers and members of the Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea (UAWK) at the Sosin Vegetable Cooperative Farm, Ryokpho District, Pyongyang on Sunday on the significant February 8, the anniversary of President Kim Il Sung's development of the Korean People's Revolutionary Army into the regular revolutionary armed forces.
					 Present there were Ri Myong Gil, chairman of the C.C., the UAWK, officials concerned, officials of the union, agricultural workers and union members in Pyongyang.
					
					 DPRK Hero Kim Sung Un, a lecturer at the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum, spoke at the meeting.
					
					 The invincible revolutionary armed forces which grew strong thanks to the outstanding military idea and energetic leadership of the President and on the basis of the faith in self-reliance and self-development, the army and people of the DPRK could beat back the aggression by the U.S.-led imperialist allied forces and fully demonstrate the dignity and honor of the country and the nation during the Fatherland Liberation War, he said.
					
					 Speakers expressed their determination to bear deep in mind the undying feats the President performed in the history of building the regular revolutionary armed forces, sincerely assist the People's Army and thus help bolster up the country's defense capability and emerge honorable victors on the agricultural front.

articles.title: New Industrial Art Works Created in DPRK
articles.content:
New Industrial Art Works Created in DPRK
Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- Creators in the field of industrial art and teachers, researchers and students in the field of education across the country have made successes in the creation of industrial goods designs and industrial art works conducive to improving the cultural living environment.
					Designs of various themes have been created in a fresh and peculiar manner.
					
					Industrial art creators of the Korean Industrial Art Studio, Pyongyang University of Fine Arts and Pyongyang University of Printing have created logos and tablets of public buildings, road direction markings and signboards in the areas of the lodging quarters of visitors and township of Samjiyon County as befitting the appearance of the mountainous city which has undergone a dramatic change.
					
					Light industrial goods trademarks and others of various themes are appreciated by people.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on February 7 National Salvation Struggle in S. Korea
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on February 7 National Salvation Struggle in S. Korea
Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- Today marks the lapse of 68 years since the south Korean people's resistance against the moves of the U.S. and its lackeys to stage "separate elections and install separate government".
					 Rodong Sinmun Sunday says in an article: The national salvation struggle waged on February 7, 1948 was an eruption of the people's bitter anger at foreign forces' moves for aggression and domination aimed at freeze the division of the Korean nation and colonize south Korea. It was, at the same time, a popular anti-U.S. struggle for building an independent and democratic reunified state.
					
					 The article goes on:
					
					 The resistance exerted great influence upon giving further momentum to the movement against the criminal "May 10 separate elections."
					
					 Ceaseless struggles for independence and democracy against the U.S. and dictatorship were waged in south Korea but the ardent desire of the people for independence, democracy and reunification so much desired by the people did not come true due to the U.S. desperate policy of aggression towards to Korea and the fascist rule of the pro-U.S. conservative forces, subservient to it.
					
					 The U.S. is the ferocious aggressor blocking the independent development and democracy in the south Korean society and throwing a stumbling block in the way of national reunification.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists' brutal "military administration" ruthlessly trampled down the sovereignty and democratic rights of the south Korean people.
					
					 The U.S. is the sworn enemy who divided the Korean nation and blocked the road of the uniform development and prosperity.
					
					 The south Korean puppet forces are a group of unpardonable traitors as they have sold the dignity and interests of the nation through heinous sycophantic rule and policy of confrontation towards the fellow countrymen in the north and created great obstacles to the independent and peaceful reunification of the country, backed by the aggressor U.S. 
					
					 The south Korean people can never shake off the yoke of shameful colonial slavery and defuse the danger of a war on the Korean Peninsula as long as the sycophants and traitors are allowed to kowtow to the aggressor U.S. keeping its aggressor forces in south Korea, concludes the article.

articles.title: Day of Sun, Day of Shining Star to Be Celebrated in Slovakia
articles.content:
Day of Sun, Day of Shining Star to Be Celebrated in Slovakia
Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- A Slovak preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversaries of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Sun and the Day of the Shining Star) was formed in Bratislava on Jan. 30.
					 Ivan Draxler, chairman of the Slovak Association for Supporting the Juche Idea and chairman of the Slovakia-Korea Friendship Association, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee set the celebration period from February 1 to April 20 and decided to significantly organize colorful political and cultural events to praise the immortal revolutionary careers and exploits of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star to Be Celebrated in Sri Lanka
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star to Be Celebrated in Sri Lanka
Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- A Sri Lankan preparatory committee for celebrating the 74th birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star) was inaugurated on Feb. 3.
					 The vice-chairman of the Sri Lanka-People's Korea Friendship Association was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to hold colorful political and cultural events to praise the revolutionary career and exploits of Kim Jong Il on the occasion of his birth anniversary.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Serbia
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Serbia
Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- A Serbian preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star) was formed in Belgrade on February 1.
					 Marijan Kubik, international secretary of the New Yugoslav Communist Party of Serbia, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize diverse political and cultural events praising the revolutionary career and undying feats of Kim Jong Il between February 8 and 19.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Norway
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Norway
Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star) was formed in Norway on January 31.
					 Dag Norum, chairman of the Ostfold County Committee of the Communist Party of Norway, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize colorful political and cultural events praising the sacred revolutionary career and undying feats of Kim Jong Il on the above-said occasion.

articles.title: Seminars on Kim Jong Il's Exploits Held in Germany, Indonesia
articles.content:
Seminars on Kim Jong Il's Exploits Held in Germany, Indonesia
Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- Seminars on exploits of leader Kim Jong Il took place in Germany and Indonesia on Jan. 28 and 29 on the occasion of his birth anniversary.
					 Present at the seminars were figures of the Franken Group for the Study of the Juche Idea of Germany, the German Branch of the Korean Friendship Association, MS Travel Company of Germany and the Rabitra Bahtera Pratama Co. of Indonesia and masses.
					
					 The chief of the Franken Group for the Study of the Juche Idea of Germany, the organizational secretary of the German Branch of the Korean Friendship Association and other speakers lauded Kim Jong Il for turning the DPRK into a political and military power with his energetic leadership.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Feats Lauded by British Organization
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Feats Lauded by British Organization
Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- The British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea issued a special bulletin "Star of Independence" on Jan. 31 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The bulletin carried his photo.
					
					 In an article titled "Kim Jong Il, shining star of Mt. Paektu, who glorified Korea" the bulletin said:
					
					 When Comrade Kim Jong Il of the Korean people was born in the secret camp on Mt. Paektu, the anti-Japanese revolutionary fighters highly praised him as the shining star of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 The birth of the shining star of Mt. Paektu marked a great event and fortune to be specially recorded in the history of the Korean nation.
					
					 Kim Jong Il was the great revolutionary who devoted his all to achieving the prosperity of Korea and accomplishing the cause of socialism and the illustrious brilliant commander who demonstrated only victory in stand-off with the imperialists despite all sorts of difficulties and trials, under the uplifted banner of Songun.
					
					 He was the outstanding thinker and theoretician who performed the immortal exploits in the history of human thought and benevolent father who took warm care of the people.
					
					 His exploits holds a brilliant place in the history of the Korean people's revolutionary struggle.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Brief Biography Carried by British Organization in Bulletin
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Brief Biography Carried by British Organization in Bulletin
Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- The brief biography of leader Kim Jong Il was carried by the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea in its special bulletin "Star of Independence" on Jan. 31.
					 The bulletin carried his photo.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Carried by Mexican Organization in Bulletin
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Carried by Mexican Organization in Bulletin
Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- The basic contents of Marshal Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Add Eternal Brilliance to Comrade Kim Jong Il's Great Idea and Achievements of the Songun Revolution" was carried by the Mexican Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism in its bulletin on Feb. 1.
					 The work published on Aug. 25, Juche 102 (2013) deals with the Songun revolutionary exploits of leader Kim Jong Il and essence and originality of the Songun revolutionary idea and indicates the tasks for successfully accomplishing the cause of the Songun revolution.

articles.title: Latin American and Caribbean Regional Committee to Support Reunification of Korea Meets
articles.content:
Latin American and Caribbean Regional Committee to Support Reunification of Korea Meets
Pyongyang, February 7 (KCNA) -- A consultative meeting of the Latin American and Caribbean Regional Committee to Support the Reunification of Korea took place in Peru on Jan. 26.
					 Present at the meeting were personages and members of the committee, political parties, organizations, organizations for friendship and solidarity with the Korean people and organizations for the study of the Juche idea in Peru.
					
					 The meeting held a by-election of the leadership of the committee.
					
					 Genaro Ledesma Izquieta, chairman of the Latin American and Caribbean Regional Committee to Support the Reunification of Korea and chairman of the People's Front of Workers, Peasants and Students of Peru, called for making the people properly know about the reality of socialist Korea and the positive efforts of the party and people of the DPRK for safeguarding the country's sovereignty and peace and security in the Korean Peninsula and the rest of the world and conduct a more dynamic drive for arousing the people to the movement for solidarity with the Korean people.
					
					 The meeting adopted a joint statement of the committee and 14 political parties and organizations of Peru.
					
					 The statement strongly denounced the U.S. heinous hostile policy toward the Korean people wanting to lead a peaceful life on the reunified one land.

articles.title: Informacion de Administracion Nacional de Desarrollo Cosmico de RPDC
articles.content:
Informacion de Administracion Nacional de Desarrollo Cosmico de RPDC
Pyongyang, 7 de febrero (ACNC) -- La Administracion Nacional de Desarrollo Cosmico de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea hizo publica el dia 7 la informacion relativa al exitoso lanzamiento del satelite de observacion de la Tierra "Kwangmyongsong-4".
					La informacion senala:
					
					Los cientificos y tecnicos de la Administracion Nacional de Desarrollo Cosmico de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea pusieron exitosamente en la orbita el satelite de observacion de la Tierra "Kwangmyongsong-4", nuevamente investigado y desarrollado segun el plan del ano 2015 del plan quinquenal estatal para el desarrollo del cosmos.
					
					El cohete transportador "Kwangmyongsong" fue lanzado a las 9 del dia 7 de febrero del 105 (2016) de la Era Juche en el Campo de Lanzamiento de Satelites Sohae del distrito de Cholsan de la provincia de Phyong-an del Norte y puso correctamente en la orbita correspondiente el satelite de observacion de la Tierra "Kwangmyongsong-4" a las 9 y 9 minutos y 46 segundos despues de los 9 minutos y 46 segundos del lanzamiento.
					
					El satelite "Kwangmyongsong-4" esta girando con el angulo de inclinacion de 97.4o en la orbita entre 494.6km de la altitud de perigeo y 500 km de altitud de apogeo y el ciclo es de 94 minutos y 24 segundos.
					
					En el satelite estan instalados los aparatos de medicion y comunicacion necesarios a la observacion de la Tierra.
					
					El exito completo logrado en el lanzamiento del satelite "Kwangmyongsong-4" deviene el orgulloso resultado de la politica del Partido del Trabajo de Corea de dar importancia a las ciencias y tecnicas y constituye un evento trascendental en desarrollar las ciencias y tecnicas del pais y la economia, la capacidad de defensa nacional del pais ejerciendo dignamente el derecho independiente al uso del cosmos pacifico.
					
					El fascinante vapor del satelite del Juche registrado en el cielo primaveral claro y azul cuando se aproxima el Dia de la Estrella Luz, maxima fiesta nacional de Corea del Sol, es el regalo de fidelidad de los cientificos y tecnicos al Mariscal Kim Jong Un y el digno partido, Estado y pueblo de la RPDC.
					
					En el futuro tambien la Administracion Nacional de Desarrollo Cosmico de la RPDC lanzara mucho mas los satelites del Juche sosteniendo la politica del gran Partido del Trabajo de Corea de dar importancia a las ciencias y tecnicas.

articles.title: Especialistas meteorologicos felicitan lanzamiento exitoso del satelite de Juche
articles.content:
Especialistas meteorologicos felicitan lanzamiento exitoso del satelite de Juche
Pyongyang, 7 de febrero (ACNC) -- La noticia del lanzamiento exitoso del satelite de observacion de la Tierra "Kwangmyongsong-4" ofrece una gran alegria y jubilo a los cientificos e investigadores de la Direccion Meteorologica e Hidrologica.
					Informado de la noticia del lanzamiento del satelite que lleva a su bordo los aparatos de medicion y comunicacion necesarios a la observacion de la Tierra, Ryu Pong Chol, subdirector de esta entidad, dijo como siguiente:
					
					No podemos contener la gran excitacion y emocion.
					
					Esta noticia infunde una gran fuerza y animo a los cientificos y tecnicos de nuestra Direccion.
					
					Gracias al desarrollo rapido de las ciencias y tecnicas del mundo se amplia mas con el paso de los dias la esfera del uso de los datos escogidos por la observacion del satelite.
					
					Los materiales enviados por los aparatos de exploracion instalados en el satelite de aplicacion practica se necesitan apremiantemente al dominio meteorologico e hidrologico.
					
					Si reciben con rapidez y exactitud los datos meteorologicos desde el satelite del Juche y toman las medidas necesarias, se acelerara mas la velocidad del avance de los trabajos por la construccion de una potencia economica y la mejora de la vida del pueblo.
					
					Choe Kwang Guk, titular del Centro Nacional de Pronostico del Tiempo, felicito calurosamente a los cientificos y tecnicos cosmicos que dejaron un hermoso vapor del satelite del Juche en el cielo primaveral claro y azul de febrero y asevero que este exito redobla mas el entusiasmo revolucionario de los empleados del Centro hacia el VII Congreso del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
					
					Pang Sun Nyo, jefa de seccion de la Direccion Meteorologica e Hidrologica, enfatizo que en acato a la politica del PTC de dar importancia a las ciencias y tecnicas dedicara toda su inteligencia y entusiasmo a la observacion meteorologica practicando el poderio espiritual y el estilo de investigacion y creacion cientificas de los lanzadores del satelite "Kwangmyongsong-4".

articles.title: Exito historico que manifesto gran vitalidad de politica de PTC
articles.content:
Exito historico que manifesto gran vitalidad de politica de PTC
Pyongyang, 7 de febrero (ACNC) -- En la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea fue lanzado el dia 7 con exito el satelite de observacion de la Tierra "Kwangmyongsong-4".
					Este evento volvio a manifestar a todo el mundo el inagotable poderio estatal basado en las ciencias y tecnicas como otra edicion del evento de diciembre de 2012.
					
					Esta noticia transmitida en febrero, significativo mes, da la infinita emocion y alegria a los ciudadanos de Pyongyang.
					
					Kim Pyong Sik, viceministro de Deporte, dijo que subio un nuevo satelite del Juche con motivo del Dia de la Estrella Luz, maxima fiesta nacional.
					
					Se siente un gran orgullo del ser miembro del pais poseedor de las armas nucleares y de la gran nacion Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il que fabrica y lanza con sus propias fuerzas cualquier satelite que desea, asevero.
					
					Y continuo que el lanzamiento exitoso del satelite "Kwangmyongsong-4" deviene un gran exito historico y gran orgullo de la nacion que volvio a mostrar la gran vitalidad de la politica del Partido del Trabajo de Corea de dar importancia a las ciencias y tecnicas.
					
					Han Un Chol, estudiante de la Universidad de Kim Il Sung expreso su alegria diciendo:
					
					Al enterarse de la presente noticia sensacional todos nosotros gritaron con emocion "!Viva!" abrazandonos fuertemente.
					
					Este exito logrado en el lanzamiento del satelite "Kwangmyongsong-4" dio una gran emocion a nuestros jovenes universitarios.
					
					Sere un verdadero cientifico patriotico que exalta al mundo entero la dignidad de la nacion como lo hicieron los fidedignos cientificos y tecnicos cosmicos quienes ofrecieron un regalo de fidelidad a nuestro partido, Estado y pueblo.
